title: How to Make a Language Translator - Intro to Deep Learning #11
excerpt: Let's build our own language translator using Tensorflow! We'll go over several translation methods and talk about how Google Translate is able to achieve state of the art performance.   Code for this video: https://github.com/llSourcell/How_to_make_a_language_translator  Ryan's Winning Code: https://github.com/rtlee9/recipe-summarization
